patch.value: echo 'Cryptogen Starts'; ls -l /shared/artifacts; while [ ! -d /shared/artifacts ]; do echo Waiting for configFiles; sleep 1; done; cd /shared && cryptogen generate --config /shared/artifacts/crypto-config.yaml && for file in $(find /shared/ -iname *_sk); do echo $file; dir=$(dirname $file); echo ${dir}; mv ${dir}/*_sk ${dir}/key.pem; done && find /shared -type d | xargs chmod a+rx && find /shared -type f | xargs chmod a+r && touch /shared/status_cryptogen_complete;
